channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HUD Sec. Turner to Newsmax: I've Been Called to Serve
item.description: Scott Turner, Housing and Urban Development secretary, told Newsmax Friday he wants to use his office to help people realize the American dream.Turner...

item.title: Trump admin ends temporary protected status for Haitian migrants currently in the US
item.description: Roughly 520,000 migrants will be affected by DHS Secretary Kristi Noem's decision to revoke TPS status of Haitians.

item.title: Newsom Sues Fox News for $787M for Defamation Over Trump Call

item.title: Trump would strike Iran 'without question' if it restarts nuclear weapons program
item.description: President Donald Trump said that additional strikes against Iran would continue if Tehran attempted to advance its nuclear program again.
